name: Jeep Rally In Desert
description:
Welcome to Jeep Rally In Desert. Here is a lot of dangerous jeep racing tracks to win this jeep rally , powerful jeeps and the full safari desert to drive multiple sports fast speed 4x4 jeeps to become the champion of desert .
Experience the thrilling, adventure, mad and crazy drive in the desert sand of Cholistan Having one of the world’s most beautiful desert dirt race tracks. Try your driving skills and become the champion of Jeep Rally In Desert.Always be fast and drive the jeep ahead of the other jeep riders.Start as a Jeep Rider and go to the pro level in safari traffic and dangerous Driving Zone.


Jeep Rally In Desert: Features

Beautiful natural desert environment
Amazing Jeeps to drive
Drive freely and make your best score to complete the mission
Smooth and responsive jeep control
Accurate driving Jeep physics with different desert tracks.
Different powerful desert racing jeeps to unlock on different laps
